title: infinite download

embed.description: Image Sans titre in Orion's images album

body:
hello;

Due to my last issue with the client I tried to re-patch it, but I got this when the ETA shows in minus, how can I fix this please?

replies.body: Your connection might be having some trouble grabbing updates, so it's backtracking tried to get missed files.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up!
